text: The Cycling Federation of the Islamic Republic of Iran is the national governing body of cycle racing in Iran. It is a member of the UCI and the Asian Cycling Confederation. The CFI promotes and organizes races in Iran and is responsible for sending teams to major international events in other countries. ==See also== *Sports in Iran ==External links== * Official website Iran Iran Cycling Category:Cycle racing in Iran Category:Sports organizations established in 1947 Category:1947 establishments in Iran
title: Cycling Federation of the Islamic Republic of Iran
